name: test
description: > Create folder with server.js > Using VSCode or terminal, run "npm install" to install Node Package Manager > Download important dependencies like eslint and express using "node install \[dependency\] -D" (-D helps keep a list of installed dependencies) > Optional: run "npx eslint --init" to initialize eslint > Paste sample code into server.js for page routing and setup > Run "node server.js" and open "localhost:\[port number\]" to test routing
